description.value:
By pointing out vulnerabilities, you grant the benefits listed in @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Hunt Prey]{Hunt Prey} and your@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Hunter's Edge]{Hunter's Edge} benefit to an ally until the end of their next turn. Depending on whether you call out or use gestures, this action gains either the auditory or visual trait.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision}
